Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

AIL_set_3D_sample_playback_rate

The function AIL_set_3D_sample_playback_rate sets the playback rate of the specified 3D sample.

void AIL_set_3D_sample_playback_rate(
  H3DSAMPLE S,
  S32 rate
);

In Parameters

S
indicates the sample handle whose playback rate is to be set.
rate
is the frequency of the sound to set.

Discussion

Some hardware limits the playback rate control to one fourth and four times the original sample rate.


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_3D_sample_playback_rate
Related Basic Types: H3DSAMPLE, S32, void
